sections.homePageTitle: Your brand is in sight – billboards and LED screens for maximum visibility!

companyInNums.text1: LED screens on the main streets of Tashkent

reason.text1: Screens and billboards are located in popular places, attracting a large number of potential customers.
reason.text2: Frequent exposure to advertising on screens and billboards helps increase your brand awareness.
reason.text3: Large screens and billboards allow for creative advertising designs, making your brand stand out from the crowd.

card1.text: The site fishtext.ru will help a designer, layout designer, webmaster generate several paragraphs of more or less meaningful text of fish in Russian, and a novice speaker to hone the skill of public speaking at home. When creating the generator, we used the well-known universal code of speeches. The text is generated in paragraphs randomly from two to ten sentences in a paragraph, which allows you to make the text more attractive and lively for visual and auditory perception.

question1.title: How many times a day are videos shown on the screen?
question1.text: Guaranteed 150 times under heavy load, 250 times under medium load and 300 times under minimum load respectively.

question2.title: Are there screens in the regions of Uzbekistan?
question2.text: Guaranteed 150 times under heavy load, 250 times under medium load and 300 times under minimum load respectively.

question3.title: What screen sizes do you have?
question3.text: Guaranteed 150 times under heavy load, 250 times under medium load and 300 times under minimum load respectively.

question4.text: Guaranteed 150 times under heavy load, 250 times under medium load and 300 times under minimum load respectively.
